name: Carol
content: Owl Cottage was just perfect for our 4 night stay to explore the area. Spotlessly clean, lovely bed linen and towels, exceptional kitchen equipment. We have stayed in many holiday lets over the years and Owl Cottage has been one of the best... the attention to detail to make your stay comfortable was exceptional. Thank you Jane for a wonderful stay.

name: Tanya
content: My second stay at Owl Cottage. Such a lovely property, good base for lots of exploring. Will definitely be back.

name: Jenna
content: Fantastic accommodation just perfect for our stay in the highlands. Owl cottage is a beautiful home away from home with everything you could think of for a holiday away. A perfect comfy, cosy cottage. We all loved it! Thank you.

name: Emily
content: Perfect, peaceful and relaxing!

name: Nicholas
content: A lovely clean home from home. The property had everything we could have needed for a week away. Easy to control heating which made staying there such a pleasure. Loved the blankets so our furry friend could relax next to us to after a busy day discovering Scotland . A truly lovey place to stay.

name: Bridget
content: We all enjoyed an absolutely amazing time at Owl Cottage, our doggies loved the peaceful serenity of the fully enclosed garden and spent most of their time chilling outside. The cottage is very well equipped and has a truly lovely ambiance. We are looking forward to visiting again in the near future üòä.

name: Dani
content: Jane couldn't have offered us a nicer place to stay. Communication was fantastic, the home is really well equipped, it was warm and cozy, especially when we lit the fire! Our puppy loved being able to run about in house and garden.

name: Marta
content: Absolutely amazing place worth every single penny. Cottage is exactly as described if not better. So clean and has everything you need. Jane is also so quick to respond to any questions and we couldn't of been happier with our stay! Highly recommend to anyone.

name: Georgia
content: We stayed at Jane's place for 4 nights with a dog. The property is super cozy and kitted out with absolutely everything you need - including basic kitchen supplies, doggy bed/treats and a full starter pack for the log burner. It's cold in Dec but when I arrived late Sunday Jane had made sure the place was warm and well lit. The place was clean, modern and beautifully furnished. I worked remotely all week and the wifi was superb - no issues. There are lots of walks nearby and outdoor space around the property for a dog. You will need to drive to get to walking spots as no footpaths along the main roads. A faultless stay, thank you!

name: Ann
content: We stayed at Owl Cottage for a few days. It's an absolutely beautiful cottage with everything you need. The added extras were welcomed such as coffee pods and a few logs for the fire. The beds are really comfortable. We have dogs, therefore the enclosed garden was perfect. I'd definitely recommend a visit.

name: Kirsty
content: We had a wonderful stay here with our dog. Peaceful and relaxing with everything you need in a home away from home. Very tastefully decorated and lovely and warm inside. Loved all the extra dog blankets so that our pup could feel at home, too! Would happily recommend!

name: George
content: Owl Cottage is a very cosy comfortable place to stay and a great base to explore and enjoy the local area. Loads to do and see locally. Highly recommended!

name: Tracy
content: We have had a fantastic time away this Autumn, such a lot to see and do. Owl cottage was warm and cozy, plenty of space for us and our dogs. Set back off the road and quiet. The power shower was a treat after a day out and about. The Falls of Foyer was not too far away but a good hike down to Loch Ness and back up. The wee cafe was perfect for a late lunch and coffee. Glenfinnin is a must visit!!! The Harry Potter train is fantastic to see!! Ben Nevis visitor centre didn't disappoint, the cable car up to the lookout area and ski cafe was fun. All in all a wonderful holiday in the highlands!! And each night to return to a warm cottage to make dinner and sit in front of the fire was a treat!!!

name: Lyn
content: Once again a superb stay at Owl Cottage where Jane has gone the extra mile to make sure everything you could possibly need is on tap. It's pristine, comfortable and extremely well equipped; it's also perfectly placed for exploring one of the most spectacular parts of Scotland - we still haven't run out of fabulous walks to do - we're already planning when we'll be back again!

name: Louise
content: Great host and wonderful accommodation!

name: Marion
content: Very clean and very spacious cottage, if you are looking for tranquility and a typical place of the highlands this is the accommodation you need! This cottage in the middle of nature and close to Fort Augustus was the place we were looking for when we wanted to do our roadtrip in Scotland. Jane is responsive when sent a message. Only drawback may be, a connection that is unstable, but is consistent with the place!

name: Wolter
content: The place was great and had everything we needed. The only thing that we would like to have seen better was the internet but that is understandably very difficult to do well in such a remote place.

name: Jennifer
content: Beautiful cottage, absolutely perfect for dogs and humans. Close enough to shops and ‚Äòthings to do‚Äô but far enough to feel like we were in the middle of nowhere. Exactly what we needed.

name: Steven
content: Would recommend Owl Cottage! The whole family loved it. My 3 year old daughter wanted to ‚Äústay at Owl Cottage forever‚Äù. It was a nice place to relax and spend time in, but also well placed to explore the surrounding areas. Jane was very responsive and helpful. If going with dogs would recommend the jaggy thistle for breakfast and the whitebridge hotel for dinner.

name: Yohann
content: Superb stay in Jane's cottage, perfect for a family of 4, very well equipped, very comfortable, quiet, a high quality service!

name: Gino
content: Great place to stay!

name: Yu-Ting
content: Everything was very lovely in the house - we really enjoyed our stay!

name: Jenny
content: The place was wonderful and there was information material ready for us. Everything was available and communication with Jane went smoothly. Unfortunately, the apartment is on a main road and there is no footpath to the nearest neighboring village. I would definitely recommend it. Thank you for the lovely holiday üòä

name: James
content: As described and a comfortable cottage that easily accommodated 4, plus a dog.

name: Lesley
content: Lovely property, very pet friendly.

name: Paul
content: Nice place, worked well for my family.

name: Tanya
content: Just got back from a couple of days in Jane's cottage and all I can say is wow. The place is immaculate and had everything we needed. the dogs had a wonderful time in the garden which is really secure ,they even met the neighbour. everything is within easy driving distance and Fort Augustus has all you need for a few days sightseeing. culloden Moor is about an hour away and really worth the drive as is InvernessThe local Spar shop has everything you need for local produce. Will be booking again for next year.

name: Anne
content: We had the opportunity to stay for a few days in this spacious and pleasantly located accommodation. From the house, you could explore in any direction, and it was centrally located in beautiful nature.

name: Jan
content: The accommodation is highly recommended. Everything you need. Garden super suitable for a dog. Accommodation is very well-equipped and is centrally located for various activities by car within an hour.

name: Lyn
content: Absolutely superb. Fabulous, tasteful, pristine accommodation with everything you could possibly need, in the perfect spot for the most amazing walks and scenery. Can't wait to come again!

name: Kathryn
content: This cottage is just lovely. Roomier inside than you expect and well located for local activities. It is well equipped, beds are comfy and it is spotlessly clean. Definitely book.

name: Catriona
content: Really great little cottage it had everything we could have asked for. It was great be able to let the dog wander about without worrying where she was in the house. Great living space, bed was lovely, big and comfy. Kitchen/dining/living area was nice and spacious and great for meal times and games too. If in the area again will definitely book again.

name: Graham
content: I would highly recommend Janes cottage.

name: Grant
content: Lovely place, warm, spacious yet cosy. The garden was perfect for dogs. Kitchen, dining and front room layout was perfect for family meals and board games. Close to many beautiful walks, the cottage was well equipped, with a log burner. the home was lovely and warm. 6 mins drive to shop which had most things. Great pub in Fort Augustus. We had a wonderful peaceful stay.

name: Jenny & Myshkin
content: We love this beautiful place! We are so grateful that we found it, l it had everything we needed. Jane is a wonderful host.

name: Christina
content: Lovely, comfortable home, good communication and east check in. Lovely area to stay in with lots to do nearby. Would definitely recommend to stay here.

name: Ben
content: The perfect place to relax and switch off from city life. The cottage was beautifully presented and we felt right at home. Our dog Mabel loved it too. The enclosed garden out the back was perfect for her. Would definitely recommend and would stay again!

name: Marie
content: Owl Cottage is a top notch accommodation. It is spacious, pristine and thoughtfully laid out. Jane provides good quality bedding and a very comfortable mattress to ensure a great sleep. The kitchen is so well equipped and will please all avid cooks, with a lovely large oven and a good assortments of pots and pans. 100 percent recommend Owl Cottage!

name: Elodie
content: Great stay at this very cozy cottage. Jane is very responsive and replies quickly to messages. Recommended!

name: Chris
content: Lovely cottage just a short drive from Fort Augustus. Would highly recommend for a family and the fact that it's dog friendly is a real plus.

name: Kirstie
content: A lovely cottage with everything we needed to relax, in between exploring the local area... just great!

name: Neil
content: Excellent cottage all finished off to a high standard, ideally situated between Inverness and Fort William. Even though it's near a main road, there is very little road traffic 3 miles from Fort Augustus.

name: Katie
content: We had a great stay with our family and having the dogs be able to access everywhere securely was just amazing and took any stress out of being away from home for them!

name: Susan
content: A comfy cottage, don't be put off as we nearly were that there are no walks from the door, a 10-minute drive and there are plenty. We had everything we needed and the scenery is just stunning.

name: Rob
content: Owl cottage was a great base for our daily outings, we would recommend it to anyone that's looking for an active break.

name: Paula
content: Owl cottage is the best cottage we've stayed at for a long time! 10/10 for everything and an ideal spot to explore Loch Ness and beautiful villages on the way to Inverness! üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å≥Û†Å£Û†Å¥Û†Åø

name: Erin
content: Great cottage, so airy, spacious and comfy. Everything you need there to call it a home from home for your stay. Our sons highlight was the 4 fighter jets in training that flew past the cottage on Tuesday morning. Lovely comfy super king sized bed. Really enjoyed our stay and have booked a return visit. communication with Jane has been great, self checkin super easy and cottage was lovely and clean with Tunnocks teacakes, milk, tea and coffee to greet us. Thank you.

name: Nina
content: Beautiful Cottage. Absolutely spotless. Superb quality fixtures and fittings. Jane went out of her way to ensure our stay was outstanding. Stunning area.

name: Alice
content: Wow! Such a lovely place to stay. You definitely wouldn't know from noise that you're on a main road but makes the cottage ideal when trying to get to places. So well equipped, very clean and just all round so comfortable. Thank you for having us - we will be back for sure :)

name: William
content: My wife, our two dogs and I have just got back from spending a week at Owl Cottage. We loved everything about it. Such a beautiful cottage in idyllic surroundings. We loved the open plan kitchen and living area and even though it mentions occasional traffic noise in the description, we didn't notice it as the road isn't busy. The Cottage was cleaned to a high standard and had all the facilities and cooking equipment we needed. We were very happy there and we can't fault it at all. It was the perfect place for us to explore the Highlands with Fort Augustus and Loch Ness only 5 minutes drive away and so many walks exploring the beautiful surroundings a short distance away too. The garden was great for the dogs and was all enclosed so they were quite happy roaming around. Jane is a great host with brilliant communication and made our stay very easy. I'd highly recommend staying at Owl Cottage and we will definitely be back to stay again.

name: Joanne
content: We had a great stay in this wonderful dog friendly cottage. We took three dogs and it was perfect for them with a lovely enclosed garden (the fence is high enough for our terriers not to scale but we didn't leave our young collie unattended in the garden just in case!) and wooden floors throughout. There isn't any walking from the cottage but there are some fabulous walks a short drive away (including one along the Caledonian canal about 5 mins drive away which was great for the dogs!)

name: Kieth
content: A great spacious, but cosy, get away from it all. Would definitely stay again.

name: Jozie
content: Beautifully presented cottage in the heart of the Highlands. Super dog friendly, the perfect place for a relaxing getaway.

name: Sam
content: Loved the house. Beautiful on inside and out. Would visit again. Perfectly located for Loch Ness and Ben Nevis. An old property but still very modern.

name: Steve
content: A great cottage - well equipped and beautifully furnished. Also ideal if you have dogs-wooden floors and an enclosed garden. We found it a good central position for our first visit to the Highlands. We would definitely recommend it.

name: Malcolm
content: Owl Cottage is beautiful inside and out. We would highly recommend to anyone wanting a home from home. It gives you some seclusion from everything yet close to all the attractions. Jane was very helpful and thoughtful for our stay and kept in touch with us via email.

name: Stacy
content: Lovely cottage, easy to move about to visit places. Warm welcome touches on arrival and plenty of info to help with our stay. Would definitely visit again.

name: James
content: Lovely cottage to explore the highlands from. Everything you need for a cost and comfy stay. üôÇ

name: Chazos
content: Wildlife on your doorstep deer birds of prey all around. the back road to Inverness has got amazing view b862, if you have a dog go for a meal at the dores pub in dores next to the beach food out of this world. Enjoy

name: Charlotte
content: I fell in love with this cottage the moment I walked in through the front door - I didn't want to leave! Really well equipped and the most dog friendly cottage I think I have stayed at. Another reviewer commented about not being able to walk from the door, which is true, but there are so many nice walks less than 10 mins drive away that it didn't matter. Nice big bed and super comfy!
